install.name: Content - Flickr Album Embedding
install.author: Lorenzo Carbonell
install.copyright: Copyright (C) 2010 Lorenzo Carbonell. All rights reserved.
install.description: With this plugin, you can embed Flickr albums into articles including in the article the key, flickr_albumid=[album_id], where [album_id] is the identification for the album.

field.name: tuser
field.label: User
field.description: Set the user name where the Flickr album is stored.

field.name: width
field.label: Width
field.description: Set the width of the Flickr album. The default width is 550 pixels.

field.name: height
field.label: Height
field.description: Set the height of the Flickr album. The default width is 445 pixels.
